website_summaries.verdict: The warranty might be attractive to some consumers, but it leaves something to be desired in terms of quality.
cons: The depth is more shallow than that of similar cubes we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: Great organization & packing tool!
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical of this method of packing, but after doing some research I thought I would give it a try. I have a 29" Samsonite & this group of bags fit perfectly. I loved the variety of sizes. I thought they were very well made, but still light & not bulky. I really feel like they helped my pack more in a smaller space & kept all my items together so when I arrived for 3 weeks in France unpacking was a breeze! I'm actually getting ready to order my second pair for my husbands suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wilson

customer_reviews.title: These help suitcase organization
customer_reviews.text: These make organizing a suitcase a breeze. I only wish I could see through them better once they are zipped. Since I was living out of my suitcase for 3 weeks, I did a lot of zipping and unzipping just to find things, but my suitcase never devolved into a rats nest. I wouldn’t travel without them!
customer_reviews.author: LKB

customer_reviews.title: Cubes Were Perfect for My Vacation!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this product after I used it for my vacation. Love the material and color. The cubes helped in making sure I didn’t overpack. Although many hotels rarely had drawers for me to place the cubes, it was so easy to simply reach for what I needed without digging through my suitcase. Ended up using one of my cubes as a souvenir case. Will definitely use them again!
customer_reviews.author: Carruiz

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and more durable than initially seems
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I've tried packing cubes. I love these! It definitely help me organize my suitcase but also helped compress the clothing I was bringing along so that they were easily accessible and kept neat. Even bigger plus, unpacking after I got home was so much easier due to the fact that I could just take out the neatly folded clothes and put the straight back into my cabinets. Presto! Unpacking done in a couple of minutes. And since they were packed properly in the cubes, no wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: ZA Nitebug

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for helping organize and saving a ton of packing space
customer_reviews.text: These were really helpful for both my trips overseas. They really do help you organize well and squeeze extra space out of your luggage. I used one for toiletries that also fit 7 pairs of socks and underwear. Others could hold multiple shirts folded without wrinkling them too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Kay

customer_reviews.title: Pack Like a Pro!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I haven’t gotten a chance to use them yet, but I’m very excited! They’re surprisingly lightweight, the material is durable and flexible, and the mesh panel allows you to quickly see what’s inside without having to open it up all the way. They also offer a lifetime warranty if you register, so really you have nothing to lose! I’m going on a backpacking trip, and I’m really excited to use these to better strategize how I pack everything in my 20L bag!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Every traveler should invest these cubes! They make the whole packing process much easier. Just roll your clothes up instead of folding them and you will have so much more space in your cubes. I used the largest cube for shorts, capris and pants. I used the second largest cube for my shirts, the third largest for my pjs and the smalles one for my phone charger. I will neve pack a suitcase without these cubes! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: AwesomeD

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Durable
customer_reviews.text: Packing cubes are such a wonderful idea in general, these packing cubes are superior to others in quality, weight, and price. I love the light weight material and the mesh for ventilation. These cubes are well made with good stitching and zippers. The sizes are convenient and useful and color selection good. I used this set on a week-long camping trip and liked them so much I purchased another set. A relative has a different brand and these are much lighter. Another relative has a different brand that are very similar in weight and construction, but more than twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love packing cubes and this one is great! It has two zippers and a partial mesh cover so you can see what's inside and it's very lightweight. I can pack several outfits in the cube, which makes it perfect for a weekend getaway. I just wish they sold the smaller size as an individual one too instead of in a set.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Area Girl

customer_reviews.title: Almost Returned Them
customer_reviews.text: I was initially disappointed at the size of each bag because I compared them to a larger more expensive set I borrowed from a friend and was going to return this set as I didn't think they would be big enough. Then I packed several articles of clothing in the largest one and was pleasantly surprised that there was room to spare. Used in a large shoulder tote along with the smaller bag for cosmetics. So nice to see organized packing as opposed to a pile of neatly folded clothes that no longer stay neatly folded when you start rummaging thru the tote, and you guessed it. I won't be returning them!
customer_reviews.author: littlesong

customer_reviews.title: Fantastically useful product!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amaaaaaazing. I love them. They make packing so much easier. They hold their shape well, fit into bags easily, you can indeed see an identifiable window of the contents, the different sizes are wonderful, and they come with a warranty (which I, of course, forgot to file, but that's just me). They're also easy to tuck away when you're not using them, since they're not stiff. I use them constantly.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: BEST Packing Cubes, Excellent Zipper
customer_reviews.text: The lifeline of a zipper truly matters in an overstuffed packing cube and PRO packing cubes doesn't disappoint one bit. This brand is a lifesaver for an avid traveler like me and I'm so reliant on these that I even bought new ones for my sister. She is also a satisfied customer!! Thank you PRO packing cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Buba A.

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose cubes make travel simpler.
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes were fabulous. They helped keep my luggage organized as I moved from one city to another during my last vacation. I also discovered that the smaller two cubes were convenient for carrying a bottle of water and other necessities which wouldn't fit into my small purse. The handle on each cube made them multipurpose.
customer_reviews.author: NBlover

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at how much fit
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before selecting these packing cubes. They're not compression cubes in the usual sense, but they zip open around 3 sides of the bag. That allows you to pack a lot in and gradually close the zipper as the bag is filled. I was amazed at how much fit!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Buijk

customer_reviews.title: Love these cubes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these packing cubes. I had my doubts as to whether they were going to be as good as they were mentioned, but they totally EXCEEDED my expectations :) I Love them, they made my packing so much easier, kept everything nice and organized....even when i got to my hotel, they just made everything much simplier. LOVE THEM and will order another set for myself and will also order a set or two for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great organizational space savers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things after 2 weeks of use. After being a pilot for 10 years, I have no idea how I ever lived without them. Basic and simple design. No obvious defects or quality issues. The zipper works great and you can pack them fairly tightly with rolled up clothing as the shell is ever so slightly smaller then the zipper track; definitely good engineering there. If they don't stand up to my weekly travel for several years, I will revise my rating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hulstein

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful!!!
customer_reviews.text: The aqua color is so pretty. I've been sold on the benefits of travel cubes for a long time. It sounds counter-intuitive but it really works. I roll my clothing and can get tons into each square. I use the small ones for cosmetics, etc. Then they stack and fit perfectly in my suitcase. My daughter kept "borrowing" mine so I bought these for her for Christmas. These are very well made and as I said, really pretty. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Kastner

customer_reviews.title: Best Invention for packing yet
customer_reviews.text: Great item. I love packing cubes. Now I have started using them, I won’t go back to packing without them. You can fit alot into each one, you will be surprised. Very well made and no issues with the zippers. The smaller ones are great for underclothes. Suitcase to drawer. Same for medium ones that I use for tank tops and tees. I use the larger ones for slacks, capris, polos and shirts. Amazing how easy to unpack, without ruffling through everything to find what you need. Example: you get to the hotel and just need nightwear. You just have to grab that cube. I use different color cubes for me vs my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used on a recent business trip and it saved a lot of space. I was able to go shopping without worrying about where I'd fit extra stuff. These also gave me room inside the suitcase to fit my travel pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my wife to complement the set of packing cubes that she already has. She is very happy with them and they make life so much easier when we traveling abroad. Airport security is so much easier if your bag gets flagged in the xray machine for a suspicious item. You can pull the individual bags out of your luggage and run them through the xray machine for a rescan and it saves so much time. While also not having any of your personal items in view of the public. Very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how much you can fit in each bag and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how much you can fit in each bag and how much easier it is to pack a suitcase. Used them when I traveled to visit a friend for two weeks and I fit an amazing amount of outfits in the large bag, with hardly taking up much space in my suitcase. My friend was so impressed that I ordered a set for her. I'm thinking about ordering more sets to store out-of-season items instead of the vacuum-sealed bags, which always seem to leak. A really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: I first saw these and other's like them in a video about packing tips
customer_reviews.text: I first saw these and other's like them in a video about packing tips. I did a little research and saw that the Pro Packing Cubes came highly rated from other sites. I purchased a set each for my entire family, allow them each to have their own color. They do come in a wide range of colors. It truly makes packing a breeze and able to compress pack a great deal into one suitcase. LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: SAVES ROOM IN SUITCASE!
customer_reviews.text: Using these packing cubes has saved so much room in our suitcase. Even though all of the air is not "sucked out"of the cubes, our clothes are compressed enough to save alot of room. Items come out with minimal wrinkling. I liked the multlicolored cubes so I can organize workout clothes, jeans, underwear, ect.. When traveling with my husband I can tell him to find his jeans "in the blue one" as an example. Purchased another set for an upcoming trip. Smaller cube is perfect to hold phone chargers and ear phones in my carry on bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tex-LA

customer_reviews.title: These packing cubes save time and are versatile!
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes were wonderful to help separate items in my suitcase. They were also handy to move from checked baggage to carry on when I made additional trips around my vacation. I would recommend these to anyone who needs to organize pills, garments, or anything to make packing easier and more efficient. I love the different sizes to meet my every need.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to separate out clothes for different days/purposes
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work. These cubes have made the packing process for long, multi-city trips much easier! I love being able to separate out clothes for different days/purposes. Quality is great and as long as they are filled, they hold their shape. I am able to fit about at least a week's worth of clothes (summer, so only one light sweater) and the filled cubes fit nicely in one half of my carry on. They can be stuffed, which is great for space efficiency. I got the 4 pcs set with the variety of sizes. I am considering buying an additional set of just the medium sized ones.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome lightweight packing cubes. They have good zippers that don't get stuck and are made of a durable looking fabric. They come in nice colors that help you locate them easily in a bag. I was surprised how much I could stuff in them and they have made packing for a two week trip in a 40 liter backpack a lot easier. Only slight complaint- the largest size is a bit large for my taste, but if you can fit everything you're bringing (easier in the summer, I think) it probably wouldn't take up too much space in your carry on or backpack. The medium size is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: J & S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a trip around the world!
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes have durable zippers and a little stretch to them, making it perfect to stack clothing items in them! They fit perfectly in my 20' luggage. Will defenatly purchase more of the mid size cube, fits 8 t shirts folded.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Perkins

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love, love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love, love, LOVE these packing cubes. I bought 5, one for each of my family members in different colors when we went to Europe for a week. We all traveled with carry-on suitcases and thanks to the packing cubes we were able to pack all of our clothes and had enough room to pack souvenirs on our return flight. The material is very light weight yet very durable. I was surprised on how much we were able to pack in it and it didn't rip, tear or give out. I highly recommend then and from now on this is the only way we will pack our bags.
customer_reviews.author: Waleska Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Well Made, Must Have Cubes for Travel.
customer_reviews.text: I love packing with cubes and this set was perfect for my size needs. They are a beautiful shade of dark turquois with some mesh on top. Very lightweight and well made. Great value. Also ordered the Pro Pack packing envelope for shirts and dresses. Love that too!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: They are like packing your dresser with you
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever travel without these? They are like packing your dresser with you. It keeps all your clothes together (shirts and sweaters, bottoms, socks/underwear and accessories; one category for each bag) in an organized way and you have more space in your luggage. Ideal for people travelling from one hotel to the next: it made my journey through Southern Germany, Austria, and Switzerland so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: These things are GREAT. I can say that i packed less because ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are GREAT. I can say that i packed less because of them. However I Just got home from my road trip where used my pro packing cubes and I loved them. They helped me organize and feel better prepared. They made my things much much easier to find when i would reach a destination or just riding in the car. I knew exactly where to go to find something fast. They were durable and well made. Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Organized lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: These bags are awesome! At first I thought the large bag seemed just excessive, however I had to buy more large one since it really fit all of my shirts really well and the amount of dirty clothes for after was great. It really eliminates the clutter in your suit case or bags when traveling. Keeps your super organized and neat. The smaller bags hold shorts and pants just as well, not to mention having a bag just for socks and underwear eliminates digging around trying to find a pair.
customer_reviews.author: david mayer II

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for smaller items (socks and underwear) keeps them altogether
customer_reviews.text: These cubes make packing so organized. Also allowed us to fit more in the suit case. Very light weight - zippers seem very strong. Clothes did not wrinkle. Bought 2 colors - one for me and one for my husband. We used for when packing for a 21 day cruise. Will be using them from now on when we travel. Wonderful for smaller items (socks and underwear) keeps them altogether. Put them in the suit case side that has the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. We received them and loved them. It's my first time buying packing cubes and I am officially a fan. They looked smaller than I anticipated upon arrival but looks are deceiving, these cubes can pack stuff in. We used the yellow for electronics, red for baby personal itemslike socks, shoes, headbands, black for my personal items like bras, underwear, swim suits, etc. and then turquoise for my outfits. Fabric is not as thick as my partners who has been using them for years but it's still good quality that will last and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Bright

customer_reviews.title: I love Pro Packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: I love Pro Packing cubes! I have various sizes for travel and bought this size specifically to pack my running gear when I travel for races and training. I can fit all of my gear in this cube with room to spare. It keeps me organized, especially when I travel together with my running friends. I love the mesh top--great for airing out my clothes. Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: cjb

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: These packing cubes are a lifesaver! I recently went on a 4 day 3 night trip to New York City, and I used the extra large for all of my clothing; which housed 6 tops, 1 dress, 4 pants, 2 night garments, 4 tank tops, and my under garments. This fit comfortably in my carry-on luggage; i also had room for my toiletries bag. I utilized the large cube for my souvenirs and it was stored in the interior zipper section of my carry-on luggage. I tend to over pack, so these cubes came in handy for organization of my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Mynaturaldivas

customer_reviews.title: The good reviews led me to chose this product
customer_reviews.text: The good reviews led me to chose this product. I couldn't be happier with them. I travel with one bag, my back pack. The PRO Packing Cubes are a perfect fit into my Osprey backpack. I am able to roll up clothing pieces and stack them into the cubes and the cubes in turn, fit nicely into my backpack. I have more space then ever to bring back extra "stuff" from my trips. Nice product and I will buy them again when the time arises. Highly recommended for the functionality and price.
customer_reviews.author: 8wheelsor2

customer_reviews.title: we decided that Pro Packing Cubes are the best, back by a 100% guarantee
customer_reviews.text: We have decided to invest in packing cubes for our upcoming family trip and ordered multiple sets in different colors. After much research, we decided that Pro Packing Cubes are the best, back by a 100% guarantee. Although we have not used them yet, we are impressed. We are even more impressed with the wonderful customer service. You can not go wrong with these cubes, and rest assured - if you have any problems at all, their customer service is A+++ :)
customer_reviews.author: Laurie & Joe

customer_reviews.title: ... options on amazon and basically said these were the best soon I bought them
customer_reviews.text: Someone here reviewed these packing cubes and compared them to other popular options on amazon and basically said these were the best soon I bought them! I really really like them. I took them backpacking in Thailand, I also took them backpacking in northern Michigan. I bought the multi color set of 4 because I thought they were the cutest. zipper seems sturdy, and I used one to hold my dirty clothes during one of my trips and the bag didnt carry the smell. will update after I wash them and have had them for a while :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: These are sooo great. made it so easy to organize my suitcase ...
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo great. made it so easy to organize my suitcase for a 3 week performance tour. one for show clothing, one for jeans and leggings, one for casual tops, another for toiletries..etc etc. I chose this brand because they are the lightest weight cubes. which makes all the difference when it comes to trying to stay under the weight for airport fees. The company takes great care of its customers..the owner emailed me and responded personally to my email giving me a discount code after purchase. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: hass

customer_reviews.title: Useful, light, and well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip with many local flights & stops. These cubes made pack/unpack every day or two so easy. Not a bother at all. Highly recommend. they are good size for pants/blouse/tees...and smaler ones perfect for undies/socks. Light weight, you can see your stuff pretty clearly. I was very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Patagonia345

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bags along with great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic bags. I tried the Eagle Creek packing cubes and loved the organization and cannot do without these cubes any more. I take them everywhere, from business trips to campsites. So I needed more. I do prefer these particular PRO Packing Cubes because they are lighter, extremely well made, and the material seems to be rip-proof. Most important, however, is also the price -- they are affordable. In addition, the customer service is outstanding. I do not normally write raving reviews, but this is a truly great product, made and marketed by great people.
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: Good packing tool
customer_reviews.text: I love the smaller sizes of these packing cubes. I bought these vs others because the mesh area is larger than most so that you can see what’s packed in each. Keeps me organized. The largest piece is good for bulky items. The zippers are smooth, but always take care when it’s packed tight not to catch fabric while zipping.
customer_reviews.author: Goldenmom

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for Easier Packing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift but the recipient has not used them yet. However, she loves the idea - she travels a lot for business and thinks these will make packing more efficient and use less space in her luggage. The quality appears to be excellent, very well made with sturdy zippers and quality fabric. They are a bit larger than I expected, which is good. The color, however, is more red than pink - not a problem for my friend, who loves red, but might be for someone actually wanting a pink shade.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Khajeh-Noori

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I never used packing cubes before, but based on the positive reviews I thought I'd give them a try. Love them!! We traveled to 4 hotels in 10 days and it was so convenient having my clothes, etc., neatly sorted. I didn't need to unpack everything each time and was able to find things easily. Since I only used them for one trip I do not know how well they will hold up, but I would definitely recommend them. I was able to fit 3 outfits in the medium size cube, plus two small cubes, in my (under the seat) carry on suitcase. Loved how everything was so easy to find during a long flight.
customer_reviews.author: DTC

customer_reviews.title: Huge Space Saver and Super Organized
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the Pro Packing cubes for the first time. Great quality, fantastic zippers and pulls, with no snagging. Lifetime warranty sold me from purchasing from other brands. Here is what I have packed in a carry-on suitcase. Large: 2 jeans, 1 pair long flannel PJs, wind pants and 7 long sleeve shirts Medium: 5 sets of base layer Small: 10 pairs of underwear. You can see from the pictures that I still have room next to the cubes and the whole top of the suitcase is empty. Wish I had more cubes. Lid of suitcase closes with no problem in this configuration. I will use the extra small cube for my electronic cables and headphones.
customer_reviews.author: ScottM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of the packing cubes. The sides are not ridged which allows for easy placement inside a suitcase. I use the various colors to pack underwear in one color, tops in another and pants in another. I am not digging through my suitcase to find things any longer. The zipper is sturdy and glides easily. The manufacturer sends an email with packing tips. You can pay more money for other products but these are well made and very comparable to the higher priced brands.
customer_reviews.author: diving-girl

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I tried a different brand supposedly good quality and after the first trip start coming apart I couldn't beleive it. So I returned them got my money back and start searching online and found the ProPackingCubes, I read the reviews and I was sold by people like me heavy travelers, I practicly live out of my suitcase, that's why I need staff that last a long time, and these cubes are made strong so far so good I haven't put them yet to real test, but I really thing they will hold very well. I've had them only for a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second set to share with my sister for our trip. These are great, you get a lot of stuff in separate packs, so you always know where lingerie, shorts, shirts, dresses are. Makes unpacking for TSA a breeze. I'm not sure of the science, but I can pack a lot more using the cubes than just a plain suitcase. Won't travel without them...and it's easy to use a small one for a gym bag or to take to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Mamalolly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my dream safari in Tanzania
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them. I used them on my dream safari trip to Tanzania. Ten days worth of clothes that had to be in a duffle. I kept teasing my roommate about my packing cubes and she started using garbage bags the same way. I've never been so organized. I bought the four pack. I do wish I could buy additional small and mini cubes separately. I use one for first aid but would like different colors for chargers and toiletries. I am a huge fan and bought sets for my grown kids snd husband for Christmas. Great product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: JHowe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful organizers for my suitcase and my dresser drawers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my granddaughter told me she uses them and they really help her to find everything in it's place without unpacking and unsorting her suitcase. I used them and love how I could organize my suitcase and find items without having to unpack and go thru everything to find one item. I took them out of my suitcase and used the smaller ones to organize my dresser drawers. I definitely will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: grandma

customer_reviews.title: Bought two different sets for my parent's upcoming cruise...
customer_reviews.text: Here is what she (mom) had to say about them... She loves the versatility of them and how light weight they are. She is looking forward to being able to organize both her and my dad's suitcases with ease. She also likes the mesh so she can see what is in them. Mom is an organizational neat freak. She chose these based on reviews she read and watched and now that she has them she approves. She would recommend them to others so I'll take her word for it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Great for Organization
customer_reviews.text: Just started using cubes, they really worked well on an international trip since we changed lodging every day or so. Easy to keep things organized. Seem well made, time will tell. Probably could use these at home for organization too, if I was so inclined LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: The packing cubes are nice and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The packing cubes are nice and lightweight, seem to be quality made and are great for organizing. The only thing I wish I had paid more attention to is that the top pieces have mesh. I would prefer they were sealed to prevent liquid damage to my clothing. Part of the reason I ordered these is because on a recent layover it was raining heavily and my hard sided suitcase sat on the luggage carrier outside long enough that dirty water leaked in and ruined a white silk blouse of mine. The packing cubes are great for organizing but won't add any additional liquid protection which I realize they don't claim to.
customer_reviews.author: J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE ITEM FOR TRAVELLERS
customer_reviews.text: For all who travel ...this is a MUST HAVE. I waited till I used them before writing a helpful review for others. what I liked most. 1) It organized my wardrobe 2) The 4 piece cube was super light 3) My evening apparel packed together in 1 large cube needed no ironing 4) Easy to find things in my luggage 5) Unpacking after a trip was a much easier and tidier job. I gave away 3 sets to friends as gifts which they loved and used.
customer_reviews.author: Sybil Schwencke

customer_reviews.title: HELPS PACKING AND RETRIEVING
customer_reviews.text: I travel 35 - 40 weeks each year. Packing my suitcase was always a struggle between ensuring I packed what I needed and being able to access it at hotels. These well-made packing cubes have solved that issue. When I get home, I launder then repack the cubes, placing them back into my suitcase, now ready for the next week's trip. At hotels, I know which case has what in it. Will be buying a set for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Hesitate... Great Product..
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disorganized when it comes to traveling. These are absolutely perfect.. They allow me to situate my clothing and accessories in a manner that is convenient, time, and space efficient. Just reach in and grab the cube I need without having to dig threw everything to find what I want. They are well made, fit my bags allowing for additional space, I could go on and on.. Strongly recommend... With out question a great buy form a great company.. Now All I need is more...lol.. Seriously you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should use these.
customer_reviews.text: These were life changing. First time I've packed with packing cubes on my 3 week trip to Europe. It really helps to organize everything I'm bringing and neatly at that. The best is when you have to dig in your bag and not have to rummage through everything to find a specific item. Also, It compacts everything into neat cubes that fit neatly in my suitcase. I used these bags to sandwich souvenirs to prevent from breaking as well. Bought my husband a set as well and he agrees they really make a difference in how you pack. As an overpacker, he found he had extra space for once !
customer_reviews.author: robyn chang

customer_reviews.title: Makes packing more organized.
customer_reviews.text: Have used these several times, and I don't know that they help you pack more into your suitcase, but they make it much more organized and easy to find and unpack. I like the various colors, makes it easy to remember what is in each bag.
customer_reviews.author: pboy

customer_reviews.title: Great for organization!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about the packing cube craze and I finally decided to go for it. I wish I hadn't waited so long! These are great and helped me keep more organized with my clothes. On top of that, my side of the suitcase wasn't a cluttered mess - my husband didn't use them and his stuff was all over the place! I would highly recommend investing in a set of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ita

customer_reviews.title: These little cubbies are truly useful. I was skeptical at first
customer_reviews.text: These little cubbies are truly useful. I was skeptical at first, but it's much more comfortable to have all the little pieces of clothing such as socks and undies in a pouch like this than scattered all around your suitcase. The only thing is, it's definitely made out of much thinner material than what it looks like here. It doesn't hold this shape by itself and arrives very crumpled up. However, I guess for traveling you don't want extra weight anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Nice cubes. Purchased a set for myself and my ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice cubes. Purchased a set for myself and my daughter for our upcoming trip to Italy. I should have done a bit more research because I wanted compression cubes but didn't select the right set. Will pay closer attention to details next time. Otherwise, these are nice cubes for organizing your suitcase!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: A game-changer!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these cubes! Lightweight but solid construction, can hold a TON of stuff, and collapses down when not in use to take up minimal space. I bought these and the Shacke Pack. Both were very good, but I went with these because they were lighter, folded away more easily, and I liked the colors (bought them in turquoise). These will be fabulous for travel, but I'm also using them at home to store my gym clothes. I tossed the smallest cube in my gym bag to hold my swimsuit, goggles, and a small towel. So happy with this purchase. Where have these been all my life?!?
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Product is worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Great selection of sizes and colors A challenge getting the bonus packing cubes. Directions need to be clarified. With time and effort my bonus was received and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaFrost

customer_reviews.title: Cut off those jangly zipper pulls!
customer_reviews.text: Snip off the metal zipper pulls with dykes and reuse the fabric part. Makes them quieter and less annoying. And lighter, for the fast-and-light travelers among us. Quality seems a hair better than I expected for the price. The handles are probably worthless considering the contents would slump when they're used. Might trim those off on principle. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: gearbox

customer_reviews.title: Simplifies packing, prevents wrinkles.  My favorite travel companion!
customer_reviews.text: All four sizes are very useful. I had some doubt about the smallest but discovered it holds 7 pairs of socks. The second smallest holds a week's undergarments, tops and bottoms. The largest size holds two stacks of my shirts -I'm a small stature woman- or five of my very tall husband's shirts. Second largest holds six rolled tee shirts. Ideal for duffle bags or soft-sided suitcases.
customer_reviews.author: BoJ Yooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have but not a game changer.
customer_reviews.text: These kept my items neat and organized. Only thing I'm disappointed by is I was under the impression they would squish down my items more than they did. They look like they would be durable. I used the smaller ones for accessories and electronic stuff like cords and chargers.
customer_reviews.author: oOScarletWingsOo

customer_reviews.title: Packing lighter!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these packing cubes and have noticed I am able to stick to carry-ons now. I like the different sizes and being able to see through the mesh. It gets a 4 instead of a 5 because I had seen youtube videos about truly compression cubes and these did not have the same features and function that way. I am still very happy happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Clark

customer_reviews.title: These bags are amazing! We took a12 day European vacation and I ...
customer_reviews.text: These bags are amazing! We took a12 day European vacation and I actually had room in my suitcase!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Jankowski

customer_reviews.title: These are a life saver when packing and very durable ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a life saver when packing and very durable, I have put them to the test many times. They save an unbelievable amount of room in your luggage. My only negative review is that I did get a whole in one of them. However it comes with free lifetime warranty if you register, so there is no need to worry about wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: TN23

customer_reviews.title: Solid packing cubes at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I wish this set didn't have the biggest one because it's too big to be practical. Would have preferred two of the mediums. Solid bags, used them while traveling through Southeast Asia to stay organized. Sturdy and light, I'm planning to use them on future trips!
customer_reviews.author: Annie J.

customer_reviews.title: Make packing a breeze
customer_reviews.text: I had originally planned to get my sister a set of the little drawstring bags that you can use for packing, but then I saw these and they seemed to make so much sense. She loves them and says they really make packing a breeze. My only complaint is that I wish all 4 of them were bright colors, instead of having 3 bright and one black.
customer_reviews.author: dsgd47

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing your luggage. I was expecting some sort of compression ability but it did not provide any. It was perfect for our vacation to Scotland since we stayed at a several hotels and made packing/repacking immensely easier.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great price for quality cubes!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure which set of packing cubes to get, so I ordered four brands to compare them. These cubes were the ones I chose to keep. They are very light, the material does not add bulk, and they are quite well-constructed. I really like the set with each piece in a different color - it helps me find what I'm looking for when digging around in a bag. Also, you can order single pieces to expand your set. I like these so much that I ordered two additional sets a few days later as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: JillyB

customer_reviews.title: For my travel needs I like the idea of being able to separate like items ...
customer_reviews.text: For my travel needs I like the idea of being able to separate like items into one cube alleviates the hassle of searching through a full suitcase. I use them for all my traveling, gym bag, in the car for carrying extra children's items. Very versatile, you can pack items flat or rolled.
customer_reviews.author: jm.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but only 3 pieces
customer_reviews.text: I for some reason only got three cubes, not four, despite having paid for four. However, the three I did get are awesome quality!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Persampiere

customer_reviews.title: Organizational
customer_reviews.text: I like what it does to organize my suitcase. I pull out what I need right out of my suitcase. It serves it purpose for me to condense and pack light as I can. The material is very light and not too durable that I hope it doesn't tear or the zipper doesn't breaks. Overall I think its good product to use.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha_Melani

customer_reviews.title: Especially useful if you are doing a multi-city/country trip since you ...
customer_reviews.text: MUST BUY IF YOU ARE TRAVELING! These make packing a breeze. Especially useful if you are doing a multi-city/country trip since you can unpack and repack easily. I tell all my friends to borrow mine and even bought a second set. Don't think twice just get these and spare yourself the trouble of digging through luggage for a specific item.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: Good for trips to multiple destinations
customer_reviews.text: This trip was the first time I used packing cubes.Had never heard of them before until recommended by a friend. I found them very helpful when moving from place to place on a vacation. It was very easy to simply place the cubes in a drawer or cabinet and not mess up the entire suitcase when looking for one item. I organized the cubes by type of clothing. Thus if I knew I wanted to wear demin pants, I went to the cube that had demin pants and tops. Underware and nightgowns in another, evening clothes in a third, etc., etc. They kept me very organized.
customer_reviews.author: lsteel

customer_reviews.title: We love these bags
customer_reviews.text: We love these bags. Everything is so neat and organized. We packed for a seven day vacation and I was totally surprised my husband's things all fit in a 21 inch carry-on bag. The bags are of excellent quality. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: MJay

customer_reviews.title: They eliminated the need to waste plastic baggies
customer_reviews.text: These cubes made packing a breeze! They eliminated the need to waste plastic baggies. The zippers would catch on the fabric occasionally, but was easy enough to undo. The fabric was light yet durable. The cubes held their shape very well. It made getting through security and customs very easy, as only individual cubes needed to be checked rather than disturbing the entire luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Dearest

customer_reviews.title: Clever products, but really overpriced
customer_reviews.text: These cubes are much smaller than they appear. Only the biggest one is useful for shirts. The next biggest one is good for a few pieces of underwear. The other two aren't useful for any type of clothing, except maybe socks. With this in mind, the cubes won't save you that much space. What they will do is organize your clothing into separate pouches, and $20 seems like a lot to pay for something like that. On the positive side, they're sturdy and the zippers appear to be well constructed, but again, I don't think they're worth $20. If they sold a package of four of the biggest cubes, that might be something worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: the Y-Man

customer_reviews.title: Made packing a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: I just got back from my first trip using the pro packing cubes and they allowed me to fit everything into one of those new smaller sized rolling suitcases. I felt much more organized; the cubes made packing and unpacking so much easier, and putting everything away when I got back was much less daunting than usual. Another bonus, with the cubes, I didn't find myself cramming things in at the last minute.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.N.

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Get these! Short but sweet :) These altered my packing life forever. I like them better than the hard-sided ones as they are adaptable. The price is so reasonable. The transparent tops are so helpful for allowing a quick peek to remember what one has put inside. I used them for everything! The sizes allow for clothing, necessities, gifts, towels, foodstuffs, toiletries etc... I am already thinking of how I could use them to organize seasonal clothes at home for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Under the Radar

customer_reviews.title: How on earth did we manage before packing cubes?
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I have used them on several trips now. These are a must have for any traveler-clothes don't move around all over your bag, everything is organized and space saving. Bonus, when you get where you're going, you just take them out and put them in a drawer. Super easy. I have watched so many videos on how people pack the cubes, so for ideas, I'd recommend doing that. These are much better priced than other brands I've looked at. I also like that they come in a myriad of different colors. When traveling with your family, that is essential. Highly recommend these. We bought 4 sets and no one has had any issues with them.
customer_reviews.author: GIJane

customer_reviews.title: Helps organize your suitcase
customer_reviews.text: I like these bags. They are less stiff than some other brands, and the mesh in the cover makes it easy to see what's inside. The zippers have large pull tabs and work smoothly. I've used these on two trips, and they make travel organization much simpler. Be sure to look at the size of each bag because you might get the impression that they are larger than they are from the photo. For a long trip, you will probably need more bags than this one set.
customer_reviews.author: LastGas

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Packing cubes are priceless! I am obsessed with them. They keep my stuff organized and tidy. I take the packs out and put them in the hotel drawer. Awesomeness! The large is very large. I don't use it much. The medium I use for shirts and/or shorts and pants. The small I use for boxers. The XS I use for socks. I can fit a week's worth in each pack. These are high quality, lightweight, and have YKK zippers. Get them! You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: King Bob

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, durable AWESOME packing cubes
customer_reviews.text: Love these packing cubes! We have now ordered and used several sets for our family of six. They are great for keeping us organized, wrinkle free and utilizes space effectively. We use them for cruises, domestic/international travel, camping boating and even trips to our cottage. They are very sturdy and reasonably priced for their quality. If we could also order individual cubes of preferred size/s rather than sets, that would be perfect. Would love to see small square cubes to stash odds and ends & fill any open spaces
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love my packing cubes! Keeps everything organized and easy to find. Sometimes on work travel I’m only in a place for a day and can’t unpack. This makes things easy! I bought a bunch
customer_reviews.author: Jules357

customer_reviews.title: It was also great for separating dirty clothes from clean ones
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about them but now am a convert. They divided my clothes from my daughter's on a long-ish trip where we used only one larger suitcase. Since we were staying at hotels for only 1-3 nights at a time, they just kept everything so organized in the suitcase, since we couldn't unpack at each place. It was also great for separating dirty clothes from clean ones. Look for them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: one.29

customer_reviews.title: These make packing a snap!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking - "I'm probably wasting my money". NO SIR! After packing with these, I thought, "How did I get along without them for so many years?" Seriously, for ME, these make packing a snap. I like the different size assortment. One bag for toiletries, one for shirts, one for underwear/socks, one for pants, or any combination. The smaller size can also be used for electronics if you already have a toiletry case. For me, this product deserves five stars. They really make packing a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Billy B

customer_reviews.title: The order came promptly and these seem to be well ...
customer_reviews.text: The order came promptly and these seem to be well made. This set even with the cubes packed leaves a little extra space in a carry-on for shoes and a decent jacket. Going through the packing process with my 12 year old and cubes seemed to engage her in getting and staying organized. Hopefully it helps her return from her school trip with all her stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Terri S

customer_reviews.title: First a skeptic; now a fan!
customer_reviews.text: I was definitely a skeptic at first and even poked fun at the product when it first came out, calling it the Tetris of travel, but once I got it I can see what the rave is all about. Our family of four always shares one large luggage. Instead having to shift through all the boys stuff to find my dresses, shirts, etc., now I can just pull out my own cube!!! Thinking about buying more! Don't know how we traveled without the cubes in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Stephy

customer_reviews.title: Described as 'lightweight' which turned out to mean 'very thin' to me
customer_reviews.text: I love packing cubes for organizing when travelling and have several sets. I decided to get one more set for my current trip. I liked the term 'lightweight' for the PRO packing cubes. But upon receipt, I found that lightweight mean they were very thin and less substantial compared to my other packing cubes at the same price point. My other bags hold their shape somewhat as you pack them. The PRO were too thin to do this. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Seadancer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent organization
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I travel with our camping trailer/RV. Space is at a premium, and organization is a must, for the limited storage capacity that we have. This "cubes" in colors, our great for organizing not only clothing, but all sorts of items: first aid, toiletries, medicines, dry wares. even paper plates and eating utensils. We are just starting out, so we will see what the "wear" factor is, and how long they last in use.
customer_reviews.author: Monte Horn

customer_reviews.title: I've used containers like this before
customer_reviews.text: I've used containers like this before, and decided to buy more. Though I haven't yet traveled with them, I like the three-dimensional feature, allowing for more items to be packed, avert wrinkling and will prevent shifting around during the tossing of suitcases by luggage handlers at airports. This item will be great for trips where I stop in several locations and have the task of packing and repacking.
customer_reviews.author: sgl

customer_reviews.title: these work great - seems like I can fit more into my ...
customer_reviews.text: these work great - seems like I can fit more into my suitcase than usual. Nice to have everything sorted.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This set fits in a carry-on perfectly! It made packing so much easier; I was much more organized, didn't have to worry about anything falling out of my suitcase, and fit quite a bit of clothing in them. They are well made/sturdy. Love the color! I also did machine wash them in lingerie bags and line dried - worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: laberaner

customer_reviews.title: NOT COMPRESSION CUBES!
customer_reviews.text: These are described as "compression" packing cubes. What they mean is YOU must compress your items as you stuff them into the bags. The bags themselves do not compress your items. If you want compression packing cubes, buy something else. These are nylon bags.
customer_reviews.author: CMobley

customer_reviews.title: These make it so easy to share a suitcase with my daughter and instantly ...
customer_reviews.text: Life changing. Sometimes a little thing can bring so much pleasure. These make it so easy to share a suitcase with my daughter and instantly know whose is whose and what is what. Sturdy construction. I got the magenta, red, turquoise and red set.
customer_reviews.author: A Garden Guru in Training

product_meta.title: PRO Packing Cubes for Travel | 4-Piece Luggage Organizer Bags Set | Premium Quality Ultralight Travel Cubes for Packing Suitcase, Carry-on, Bags and Backpack - Marine Blue
feature_bullets: PRO PACKING CUBES best travel cubes compression set for carry-on luggage, suitcase and backpacking. Offered in a variety of striking colors, they're perfect for couples and families sharing luggage space. Ultra-lightweight, durable construction and vivid colors are why they come up top in travel cube reviews.

SPECIALIST BRAND: We've been making travel cubes from day 1. Quickly organize your bag, & breeze through airport security as TSA can easily & discreetly check your belongings through mesh panel. Perfect for multiple stops; you'll love the speed of repacking between destinations.

ORGANIZE and COMPRESS clothes. Packing squares enable you to fit more in your luggage AND arrive with wrinkle-free clothes. Pack by outfit or garment type, and use a cube as a LAUNDRY BAG for your return. Slim cubes double up as shoe bags.

PERFECT FIT for airline carry-on suitcases, tote, weekender, backpacks and duffel bags. Easy organization for FAMILY breaks, BUSINESS travel, BACKPACKING, CAMPING, HIKING, RV, CRUISE holidays & SADDLEBAGS. Use smallest cube as a toiletry bag or storage for cables & electronic accessories. Unparalleled versatility. See description for exact measurements.

BUILT TO LAST - LIFETIME GUARANTEE! If you value QUALITY, these cubes are for you. We want you happily telling friends about us. We're here to support you, or refund your money with our no quibbles guarantee. RISK FREE PURCHASE from a LEADING BRAND YOU CAN TRUST
